testcase.name: checks that proper user profile info can be retrieved
testcase.system-out: Given accept "application/json" mediaTypes..................................passed When the client performs GET request on /me/profile.........................passed Then status code is 200.....................................................passed And response contains property "id" of type "string"........................passed And response contains property "name" of type "string"......................passed And response contains property "email" containing phrase "@rcomext.com".....passed

testcase.name: test 2
